name: WindowBlinds Compressed Skin
summary: Learn about .WBA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WBA files are basically compressed .ZIP files that are unzipped when opened with WindowBlinds. They can also be decompressed using another Unzip program like WinAce or WinZip if the file extension is changed from ".wba" to ".zip."

description: Custom skin or theme created with WindowBlinds, a program used for customizing the interface of the Windows operating system; can alter the look of window borders, title bars, task bars, progress animations, toolbar icons, the Start menu, and other aspects of Windows.
